title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 990.8 - Administrative law judge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 990.8 - Administrative law judge

State Regulations

The executive director may delegate on behalf of the Safety

Board to an administrative law judge the authority to conduct hearings pursuant
to the provisions of the State Administrative Procedure Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
990.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
